DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact of ALDH2 Glu504Lys polymorphism on aortic dissection.
DOC.brief_title: The Relationship Between ALDH2 and Aortic Dissection
DOC.criteria: Chinese Han people diagnosed with aortic dissection in Qilu Hospital Aortic dissection based on trauma, connective tissue diseases and pregnancy Patients with tumor Patients with no written consensus
